archimate:ApplicationService.name: [Spectrograph Archiving] AT Catch-Up Archiver Service (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
AT Archiver Service aquires pixel data in catch-up mode from the spectrograph buffer and feeds backend services.
This is an OCS-commandable device. The service is driven by the externally provided list list of catch-up exposures stillr esiding in spectrograph buffer. It assembles pixels into a FITS file and forwards the data to othger services supplying a real-time view of the aquired data to ther observatory and providing for archiving of the raw data into the backbone.
